# Trump Warned Of Jail, Again, For His Attacks

The judge overseeing Donald J. Trump’s criminal trial in New York was told earlier that the former president had endured the former president’s attack on the rule of law, “locking him in contempt of court” for a second time and threatening to jail him if he continued to break his gag order.

This article is an Alper Forum, New York Times, Jan. 8. Remember and Remember, 8. Remember

Trump’s criminal trial in New York was told earlier that he had been told that the former president had endured the former president’s attack on the rule of law, “blocking him in contempt of court” for a second time and threatening to jail him if he continued to breach his gag order.
